message.name: A62
message.say: Well, Jordan, a good example would be a newspaper. A newspaper can inform us about what is going on in the world with articles that include facts.

message.name: A63
message.say: Hi

message.name: A64
message.say: , Good to see you here today.

message.name: A65
message.say: well

message.name: A66
message.say: and jordan, we are going to be learning about texts with more than one purpose. They are called hybrids.

message.name: A67
message.say: it can also have advertisements that are meant to persuade us to buy something

message.name: A68
message.say: With e-mail and with regular mail, we have tons of people writing us stuff for a variety of reasons.

message.name: A69
message.say: A lot of that mail has a hybrid of purposes and it can be really useful for us to try to understand the primary purpose for a writer to write something.

message.name: A70
message.say: That way we can decide what we want to keep, to respond to, or to throw away. Let's look at some emails and think about why the writer wrote them!

message.name: A71
message.say: , thanks for joining us. I hope this made sense to you!

message.name: A72
message.say: That's right. It is important for us to see the multiple purposes of the text, so that we can understand what the writer wants us to know, do, or believe. It also shapes the way we respond, especially to emails or letter.

message.name: A73
message.say: and it can have comics that are written to entertain us.

message.name: A74
message.say: That is a good point, Jordan. Most writer's have more than one reason for writing a text.

message.name: A75
message.say: Sure. Today, we are going to look at some websites. Websites are a great example of hybrids. For each website, we will try to decide what the author's purposes are and we will support our predictions with text signals from the website. Let's get started.

message.name: A76
message.say: Now that you and Jordan have looked at the website. Let's think about the purpose of the website.

message.name: A77
message.say: We are looking at Friendbook.

message.name: A78
message.say: The topic of this website is socializing online.

message.name: A79
message.say: The topic of this website is not online job searching because nowhere on the website does it say that you can use the website to search for jobs

message.name: A80
message.say: The topic of this website is not online dating. This is because the website actually does not indicate that it can be used to match people together for the purpose of dating

message.name: A81
message.say: , what do you think the topic of this website is?

message.name: A82
message.say: Jordan, do you know the topic of this website?

message.name: A83
message.say: Since it is a hybrid, the website Friend book has more than one purpose.

message.name: A84
message.say: The purposes of this website are to inform and entertain. A user of FriendBook wants to keep their friends informed about who they are and what they are doing. It also collects facts like birthdays. Additionally, some people use FriendBook as a way to make humorous remarks to entertain friends and family.

message.name: A85
message.say: the purposes of the website are to persuade and inform

message.name: A86
message.say: The purposes of the website are not to entertain and persuade

message.name: A92

message.say: The highlighted text signal that is most informative is It starts at 8 p m. Now, you know what time to go to the party. Although, Bob clearly wants Jordan to come to the party, a major part of the invitation is informative details that let you know what to do and what to expect.
